author: Victor Ferreira
title: ‘Don’t be a hero’: Why some market watchers are reluctant to call a bottom despite big rally for stocks
description: Given bear market traditions, 'we still need that last kick in the stomach'
content: The fear was real. Wall Street was ready to celebrate the passing of a US$2 trillion stimulus package, but after partisan bickering on Sunday and again on Monday left the bill in limbo, investors panicked. With the Democrats and Republicans incapable of setti… [+6103 chars]
